context: bernie was a former marine who served in vietman. he is probably rolling in his grave seeing how dishonestly the news is covered on stations like OAN and Fox

While I am not a fan of CNN, Bernard Shaw provided the network with credibility. I enjoyed his work. CNN has not had a comparable "replacement" for Bernard yet! Thank you for your superior talent sir!
One of the last real credible reporters. May he rest in God's hands.
Back in the day before CNN became the Colon Nugget Network.
Back when CNN was an actual source for news.
A real journalist. Not the flaming heterophobe of today's CNN that is Donna Lemonade.
Mr. Shaw worked for CNN in  the 1990s back when CNN wasn't spouting lies and propaganda. He was a great anchor and will be missed. My condolences to his family.

context: This guy was the last real journalist CNN had.  He was like Cronkite.  You never knew what his personal politics were.  He reported the news without spin.  CNN's decline started upon his retirement.  RIP Mr. Shaw.
